alert.note: Alert for Northern Big Horn (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 3:50PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Big Horn County through 430 PM MDT... At 350 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 18 miles northeast of Worden to 12 miles southeast of Huntley. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Tents and other temporary outdoor shelters could collapse. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hardin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for south central Montana. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for south central and southeastern Montana.
